content:
/>
XIV.4.D.5.b
.
Verification and Further Development Unnecessary
If verification and further development are unnecessary, take the following actions:
clear the appropriate EP 154 or 314 and dispose of the worksheet under the appropriate Administrative Support Staff directive
send a decision letter to the VA beneficiary advising that benefits will remain unchanged, and
annotate the copy of this decision letter to show that EP 154 or 314, as appropriate, was cleared and note the current date.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
